discussion.content:
D. Record-triggered flow.
A record-triggered flow can be used to automate actions when a record is created, updated, or deleted. In this case, when a child record connected to a parent record via lookup is deleted, a record-triggered flow can be used to update a field on the parent record. Validation Rules, Quick Actions, and Screen flows are not appropriate for this automation requirement.
